gov.nasa.worldwind.util.tree

Interface TreeLayout

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AVList, EventListener, MessageListener, PropertyChangeListener, Renderable, WWObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTreeLayout

    public interface TreeLayout
extends WWObject, Renderable
    Handles rendering a Tree. The layout is responsible for the overall arrangement of the tree.
    See Also:
    Tree

      • makeVisible

        void makeVisible(TreePath path)
        Make a node in the tree visible in the rendered tree. For example, scroll the tree viewport so that a path is visible.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to make visible.
